member.name: T:ROP.Toolkit.TwoTrack
member.summary: Use TwoTrack type as your underlying model for dataflow situations. Create a function for each step in the use case. The function for each step can in turn be built from smaller functions. Use standard composition (>>) to connect the functions. If you need to insert a switch into the flow, use bind. If you need to insert a single-track function into the flow, use map. If you need to insert other types of functions into the flow, create an appropriate adapter block and use it.
